===================== XMCS Collect Peaks =====================
----------- Description -----------
| The module combines several XCMS-Sets into one XCMS-Set object. This step is useful to perform further pre-processing steps over multiple XCMS-Sets e.g. **xcms-group-peaks** and **xcms-correct-rt**
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) XCMS-Set file(s) | rdata | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
XCMS-Set file(s) | A data set collection that contains several XCMS-Set objects which were generated by e.g. **xcms-find-peaks** |
------------ Output files ------------
xcms_collect_peaks_output_1.rdata | A rdata file containing one XCMS-Set of multiple XCMS-Set objects |
